text: The Fiat Siena is a subcompact car produced by the Italian manufacturer Fiat from 1996 to 2021. It is the four-door sedan version of the Fiat Palio, a supermini car especially designed for developing countries. It was introduced for the first time in South America, and was produced in various countries worldwide. The Siena was produced in two generations from 1996 to 2012. Siena Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Fiat Siena
